title: Today in the UK
description: Daily-generated site showing recently-updated parliamentary bills alongside the top headlines from a selection of UK news organisations.

title: patter.lol
description: Stateless, peer-to-peer chat with random people.

title: Security analysis of nRF52 and CC254x chips
description: Replicating stacksmashing and LimitedResults' work to bypass the nRF52832 code readout protection and attempting the same for the CC2541 (unsuccessfully).
